label: 仁王経
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: In full the Ninno Gokoku Hannya Haramitsu Kyo (仁王護国般若波羅蜜経), the Benevolent Kings Protecting Their Country Sutra, which was ultimately based on the Daihannya (Prajna paramita) Sutra.
